entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -34.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
